text_1_facilitator.eng: Let’s see how a father praises his daughter, @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name during one-on-one time.

character_1_text.eng: You found one blue slipper and one with stripes. Let’s find slippers that match and place them neatly on the shoe rack.

rows.text_1_facilitator: Let’s see how a father praises his daughter, @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name during one-on-one time.
rows.character_1_text: You found one blue slipper and one with stripes. Let’s find slippers that match and place them neatly on the shoe rack.

character_1_text.eng: Another slipper! This one is white. It’s frustrating to try to find a matching pair when there are so many house slippers on the floor.

rows.character_1_text: Another slipper! This one is white. It’s frustrating to try to find a matching pair when there are so many house slippers on the floor.

character_1_text.eng: You are being very patient and looking very hard, @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name. Well done for trying. I am happy you are helping me.

rows.character_1_text: You are being very patient and looking very hard, @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name. Well done for trying. I am happy you are helping me.

character_1_text.eng:
You found two slippers with the same colour! Well done for not giving up, @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name! 

Because you helped me so well, I now have 5 extra minutes to play with you. What would you like to play?

rows.character_1_text:
You found two slippers with the same colour! Well done for not giving up, @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name! 

Because you helped me so well, I now have 5 extra minutes to play with you. What would you like to play?

text_1_facilitator.eng: Let’s reflect on what we saw.

quiz_1_option_1_text.eng: To boost her self-esteem and confidence

quiz_1_feedback_1.eng: Exactly! When @data.characters.f1_father.name praises @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name, she feels good about herself.

quiz_1_option_2_text.eng: To make her feel good about herself.

quiz_1_feedback_2.eng: Not exactly, but the praise does help her deal with his frustration. When @data.characters.f1_father.name praises @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name, they want to keep looking for the slipper!

quiz_1_option_3_text.eng: To encourage him to work harder

quiz_1_feedback_3.eng: Not exactly, but the praise will help her want to help more often. When @data.characters.f1_father.name praises @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name, she will remember being praised and be more likely to help her father in the future!

quiz_2_question.eng: What can we learn from @data.characters.f1_father.name in how he praises @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name?

quiz_2_option_1_text.eng: He yells so she is sure to hear him.

quiz_2_feedback_1.eng: False. @data.characters.f1_father.name doesn’t yell at all but he does go down to @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name’s level. This is important so he can connect to her. @data.characters.f1_father.name’s actions show us that the way we give praise is also important.

quiz_2_option_2_text.eng: He uses her name and makes eye contact

quiz_2_feedback_2.eng: True! All @data.characters.f1_father.name’s actions show us that the way we give praise is also important.

quiz_2_option_3_text.eng: He tells her she is a “good girl”.

quiz_2_feedback_3.eng: False. @data.characters.f1_father.name praises her daughter for something specific and provides the praise immediately. This shows us that the way we give praise is important for it to be effective.

quiz_2_option_4_text.eng: He praises her for the process of trying and not for the result.

quiz_2_feedback_4.eng: True! All @data.characters.f1_father.name’s actions show us that the way we give praise is also important.

quiz_2_option_5_text.eng: He does not criticise his mistake

quiz_2_feedback_5.eng: True! All @data.characters.f1_father.name’s actions show us that how we give praise is also important.

quiz_3_question.eng: Why does @data.characters.f1_father.name give @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name a hug and extra playtime together?

quiz_3_feedback_1.eng: The hug does show love, but it also rewards her for helping him. Giving a simple reward helps our children to do things that may be difficult for them again.

quiz_3_option_2_text.eng: So that she knows that she doesn’t have to help anymore again.

quiz_3_feedback_2.eng: Actually, the hug will encourage her to help again next time! Giving a simple reward helps our children to do things that may be difficult for them again.

quiz_3_option_3_text.eng: To encourage her to stay patient

quiz_3_feedback_3.eng: That’s right, giving a simple reward helps our children to do things that may be difficult for them again.
